items.title: The Untold Technological Revolution Sweeping Through Rural China
items.abstract: In “Blockchain Chicken Farm,” Xiaowei Wang documents how technology is transforming the lives of China’s rural poor.
keywords: Blockchain Chicken Farm: And Other Stories of Tech in China's Countryside (Book)

items.title: For These Young Visionaries, Design is an Illusion
items.abstract: All under 40, they’re deploying next-level technologies to create products, projects and experiences that test the limits of design — and our imaginations.

items.title: ‘American Dreaming’ Celebrates a Heady Era of Car Design
items.abstract: The show, at Lawrence Technological University, features sketches by more than 100 stylists who worked for the big automakers between 1946 and 1973.

items.title: The Met Opera Cuts Back on Screen Time for Berlioz Next Season
items.abstract: Citing “technical demands,” the company will replace its revival of a video-heavy production of Berlioz’s “La Damnation de Faust” with concert performances.

items.title: Feeling For | Nike’s Limited-Edition Free Flyknit Sneaker Celebrates New York City
items.abstract: The brand’s latest slick, technologically sophisticated line of running shoes includes a special model that pays tribute to the Big Apple.
